game.name: Bot Vice
game.categories: Single-player, Steam Achievements, Full controller support, Steam Trading Cards, Steam Cloud, Steam Leaderboards, Remote Play on TV, Family Sharing
game.shortDescription: Show off your skills & reflexes in this frantic gallery shooter action arcade, filled with bullets, bots and explosions! You play as Erin Saver, carrying out her personal vendetta against the criminal Wildbots.
game.shortDescriptionEn: Show off your skills & reflexes in this frantic gallery shooter action arcade, filled with bullets, bots and explosions! You play as Erin Saver, carrying out her personal vendetta against the criminal Wildbots.

reviewHighlights.text: RECOMMENDED - a small indie project that reminds me of the shootout boss fight segments in Sunset Riders. It is clearly inspired by the best "16-bit"...
awesome little game, although short, it's fun and addictive, and quite challenging and intensive at times. replay value +.
